CREATE TABLE category(
catNo varchar(50) not null, catName varchar(100), subName varchar(100),
primary key(catNo) )
insert into category (catNo, catName, subName) values (?, ?, ?)
select * from category where category.catNo = ?
select * from category
delete from category where category.catNo = ?
update category as c set c.catName = ?, c.subName = ? where c.catNo = ?
select c.catNo from category as c

CREATE TABLE user ( uId varchar(50) not null, uName varchar(100), uMail varchar(100), uPass varchar(100), uR_Pass varchar(100), u_type varchar(100),
CONSTRAINT user_pk PRIMARY KEY(uId) );
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user
INSERT INTO user (uId, uName, uMail, uPass, uR_Pass, u_type) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select * from user where user.uId = ?
select * from user where user.uName = ?
select * from user
select * from user where user.uName =?
delete from user where user.uId = ?
update user as u set u.uName = ?, u.uMail = ?, u.uPass = ?, u.uR_Pass = ?, u.u_type = ? where u.uId = ?
select u.uId from user as u

CREATE TABLE payment (
id varchar(50) not null, cardNo varchar(20), cusName varchar(40), expiryDate varchar(50), cvv varchar(4), email varchar(100), amount varchar(100), phone varchar(20), user varchar(100), item varchar(100),
PRIMARY KEY(id) )
insert into payment (id, cardNo, cusName, expiryDate, cvv, email, amount, phone,user,item) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?)
select * from payment where payment.id = ?
select * from payment where payment.user = ?
select * from payment
delete from payment where payment.id = ?
update payment as p set p.cardNo = ?, p.cusName = ?, p.expiryDate = ?, p.cvv = ?, p.email = ?, p.amount = ?, p.phone = ?,p.user =? ,p.item =? where p.id = ?
select p.id from payment as p

CREATE TABLE images ( username varchar(100) NOT NULL, photo longblob NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (username) )
insert into images (username, photo) values (?, ?)
update images as i set i.photo = ? where i.username = ?
delete from images where username = ?
select i.photo from images i where i.username= ?
